page.title: 02PLUMTREE HALL
page.content: Plumtree Hall is a residential home for elderly people. It is situated approximately 2OO yards south of Heversham C.E. Primary. Plumtree Hall was built in l82O. It now has ten single residents, one couple and one house-keeper. When we went there we only had time to interveiw one person mainly. She was called Mrs. Mellor. Mrs. Munro has been there the longest which is l2 years. She came from Kendal. One of the apartments was made out of a hay loft (Mrs. Mellors.) The Plumtree residents must be retired but active. The ladies have every other Thursday in Mrs. Mellors flat having their hair done. They also have a communion service once a month. Mrs. Mellor has lived in the area for 35 years but has been at Plumtree Hall for 6 years.
